p: 1 g of microcapsules were added into a flat‐bottomed weighing bottle and taken in a suitable drier, at 25 ± 1°C, containing the saturated solution of (NH 4) 2SO 4. After 7 days, the microcapsules were weighed again and hygroscopicity was calculated as the water content per 100 g of microcapsules (Botrel et al., 2012).
